Package pl.myrecipebasket.service

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CategoryService
    Object CategoryService is a intermediate layer between persistence layer (CategoryRepository) and view layer (HomeController and RecipeController).
    CommentService
    Object CommentService is a intermediate layer between persistence layer (CommentRepository & RecipeRepository) and view layer (HomeController & CommentController).
    ImageService
    Object ImageService is a intermediate layer between persistence layer (ImageRepository) and view layer (CommentController).
    RecipeService
    Object RecipeService is a intermediate layer between persistence layer (RecipeRepository & UserRepository & CategoryRepository) and view layer (CommentController & HomeController & RecipeController & VoteController).
    RoleService
    Object RoleService is a intermediate layer between persistence layer (RoleRepository) and view layer.
    UserService
    Object UserService is a intermediate layer between persistence layer (UserRepository & RoleRepository) and view layer (CommentController & HomeController & RecipeController & @RegisterController & VoteController).
    VoteService
    Object VoteService is a intermediate layer between persistence layer (UserRepository & VoteRepository & RecipeRepository) and view layer (VoteController).
